name: Fields of Elysium
description:
Fields of Elysium is a simple adventure platformer where you go through 4 worlds to defeat the largest slime - once your finished you get level selection! This game took about 2 months to create - and feedback is accepted. I cannot confirm whether I will keep working on the game.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Shift to sprint

Escape to pause

You can hold up or down to pan the camera

On desktop platforms - ALT + Enter for fullscreen

This game has controller support too - it was designed in mind with a DS4 controller however.

Full source code is under the MIT license

https://github.com/Aspring15/Fields-of-Elysium
